name: OSMaps
author: Alessandro Lin

sections.description:
Lightweight Plugin to display in your website multiple free road maps.
You can have as many maps as you need but only one per page.
You can display a “VIEW MAP” button. A single page can have many buttons.
To display a Map you can choose between Api javascript Openlayers and Api Leaflet
Map tiles by OpenStreetMap. Access key is not required.
Map tiles by Mapbox. Access key is required. Mapbox create satellite maps.

Features

  • Simple Map.
  • Complex Map, with Marker and / or PopUp. The popup created with the Api OpenLayers has a green icon with links to the Directions.
  • Multiple maps.
  • Road maps and satellite maps.
  • Displays a “VIEW MAP” button. View the map, full screen, on a new page.

Demo

View:

Minimal usage

  • Configure the Settings -> OSMaps from the admin dashboard. Change the defaultMap options and save.
  • Insert the shortcode in an article or in a page. Look the OSMaps administrative page for the shortcodes.
  • Done!
sections.installation: Upload the OSMaps plugin to your site and activate it.
sections.faq:
I own a shop in Venice – Italy, near Piazza San Marco. How do I find his coordinates?

You can use this utility page: Help Coordinates
sections.changelog:
= 2.3.8 – Oct 2023
* The plugin has been adapted to wordpress 6.4. Small changes for a more precise adaptation.

= 2.3.7 – Mar 2023
* The plugin has been adapted to wordpress 6.2

= 2.3.5 – December 2022
* Update Leaflet API to Version 1.9.3

= 2.3.0 – September 2021
* “VIEW MAP” Button.
* Fixed a bug.

= 2.2.2 – December 2020
* Added tiles Mapbox

= 2.2.1 – December 2020
* Fixed a bug

= 2.2.0 – December 2020
* Add API js Leaflet

= 2.1.0 – November 2020
* Fixed a bug in javascript

= 2.0.0 – June 2019
* Multiple maps

= 1.1.0 – May 2019
* Disable wheel

1.0.0 – April 2019

  • Initial release.
